timeline.message:
Fix nullRepresentation argument not used (#7084)

nullRepresentation was not set in constructor LocalDateRenderer(valueProvider, formatter, nullRepresentation)

(cherry picked from commit d75e14cfe8177076593e917daaba304438beb02a)
Cherry-pick #7154 (Only sending to server should be postponed)

Fix broken mobile dnd polyfill for ipad on iOS13

Fixes #7123

(cherry picked from commit e8031dd9b4d17c87e219836976907dcb1c70dd84)

Workarounds for Safari 10  <script nomodule> and scope bugs (#7165)



(cherry picked from commit b015aa7795da2a4cb0a4d7c7635ec0c7051651b9)

Update chromedriver to v79 (#7181)


(cherry picked from commit debbbc80aa1f55b57c7a22c10ecde7a32deb5893)

Pass query parameters to the new location (#7189)


(cherry picked from commit d29ff5819ccc4f841eac07d024a93436baf0f708)

Remove test-jar artifact from flow-server (#7222)

* Remove test-jar artifact from flow-server

Fixes #7204

(cherry picked from commit 7ac9481aae93b7b77503f412d547ac0e9076ca27)

Don't add abstract error targets (#7215)

Filter out any abstract classes from
error navigation targets as they can't
be instantiated anyway.

Fixes vaadin/spring#530

(cherry picked from commit df2d460d6bcc376ac9b07c90507c09e3cf1d6143)
Cherry-pick #7061 (Unregister listener when disconnecting web component)

Make node.js install prompt more friendly (#7197)


(cherry picked from commit 5d355e600c09a128f487ea05734109201a6a90ca)

Only clear all if value changes. (#7212)

If we remove all when the innerHTML
value stays the same we will loose the innerHTML
on the client as the value is not re-sent,
but is still cleared from the client.

Fixes #4644

(cherry picked from commit efdc44a295329e41ceca2cc7a474a8f6f6090a75)

Fix ElementStateProvider serialization (#7192)

Add readResolve method for singleton class handing
during (de)serialization of state providers.

Fixes #7190


(cherry picked from commit 8871df4551c956544f4d4c387b27e1f5c73817bb)

Assert chrome version 79 (#7201)


(cherry picked from commit 97fcebc2fde60f3aacf9b39eff195fb7fc90ba7e)

timeline.bodyText: Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "//]]>" 3 times.
timeline.author: vaadin-bot
